recommended_degree: Teknik  Industri, Teknik Mesin, Teknik Manufaktur (Sarjana)
job_description:
Intern Qualification
Position		: Quality Engineer
Tech. Qualification	:
•	Knowing about ASME Y14.5 GD&T Standard
•	Experience operated Autocad 
•	Basic english technical literation
•	Basic understanding of mechanical components (dimensions, tolerances, fits)
•	Basic measurement skills (vernier caliper & micrometer)
•	Advanced ms office skills
Soft skills:
•	Good documentation habits
•	Willing to learn
•	Active communication & feedback
Responsibility:
•	Follow up project inquiry due date (weekly report)
•	Machining drawing review
•	Maintain standard reference & eng. Spec. Documentation (monthly report)
•	Support ncr documentation & follow up
•	Help maintain calibration record (monthly report)
•	Assist qc inspector in product inspection
•	Maintain daily activities report
